issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h6.Reproduce
1. Install TiSDK 3.5.0.GA 
    1.1. run ti sdk install 3.5.0.GA 
    1.2. run ti sdk select 3.5.0.GA 
    1.3. run ti info
    1.4. notice it finds xcode as expected 
2. Intall latest SDK
    2.1. ti sdk install --branch 5_0_X 5.0.0.v20150908113920 
    2.2. ti sdk select 5.0.0.v20150908113920 
    2.3. ti info, notice how it fails. 
3. This then once the computer reboots fails to find xcode 7 leading to builds in studio not working but working from the cmd line.

h6.Note
Not sure this is a CLI problem or SDK problem, since 3.5.0 SDK, ti info works well.
seems this is only introduced by latest SDK.
fields.summary: iOS9: Ti info does not work with latest TiSDK & Xcode7 beta leading to studio unable to find xcode

comments.body: What version of the Titanium CLI are you using? This might be a configuration issue. You need the latest version (5.X).
Closing as unable to reproduce based on no response. If this is still an issue, please reopen.
